name: csv-center-splitter
label: CSV Center Splitter
description: Splits a CSV by center ID
author: NACC

redcap_email_configs.description: JSON file containing REDCap email configs

dry_run.description: Whether to do a dry run

adcid_key.description: Column name from the input CSV with the ADCIDs

target_project.description: Label of target project to write the split results to; each ADCID in the split results is expected to have a project

staging_project_id.description: Staging project ID to stage all results to; overrides target_project

include.description: Comma-delimited list of ADCIDs to include in the split. Will ignore all others

exclude.description: Comma-delimited list of ADCIDs to exclude in the split. Will evaluate all others

batch_size.description: Number of centers to batch; will wait for all downstream pipelines to finish running for a given batch before writing others

downstream_gears.description: If scheduling, comma-delimited string of downstream gears to wait for

local_run.description: Set to true if executing on a local input file

apikey_path_prefix.description: The instance specific AWS parameter path prefix for apikey
